text: Moreiradromia is a genus of sponge crabs in the family Dromiidae.Davie, P. (2014). Moreiradromia antillensis (Stimpson, 1858). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=421894 on 2014-11-01 ==Species== Species within this genus include: * Moreiradromia antillensis (Stimpson, 1858) * Moreiradromia sarraburei (Rathbun, 1910) ==References== Category:Dromiacea
title: Moreiradromia
